entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Then increasing cloudiness. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
